original_text: But ye, O mountains of Israel, ye shall shoot forth your branches, and yield your fruit to my people of Israel; for they are at hand to come.
korean_text: 그러나 너희 이스라엘 산들아 너희는 가지를 내고 내 백성 이스라엘을 위하여 열매를 맺으리니 그들이 올 때가 가까이 이르렀음이라

sentences.original_text: But ye, O mountains of Israel
ye shall shoot forth your branches
and yield your fruit to my people of Israel
for they are at hand to come
